# Introduction


```{r include=FALSE}
data.raw <- get.raw.dataset()
data.melt <- get.melted.dataset(data.raw)

data.melt$education <- data.melt$education_boys - data.melt$education_girls

data.melt %<>% append.regions()

data.melt.avg <- data.melt %>% 
  dplyr::select(-"year") %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(country) %>% dplyr::summarise_each(list(avg = ~mean(.x, na.rm=T)))
```
